title: Center associate director writes book chapter (North Dakota State University)
text: ( Source : North Dakota State University ) Karen P. Peirce, associate director of the Center for Writers, published a chapter, titled 'Employing Ethos to Cross the Borders of Difference : Teaching Civil Discourse,' in the edited collection
